text:
El sabor de la lluvia.
 ¿Por qué arrodillarse?
by Jack Kerouac

Se extingue el día,
 pero no el canto de la alondra

snow is still falling,
 it time for apres yet?
let's do one more run

beep boop bop beep boop,
i am robot octocat,
i think there's a bug

same plot as before,
so why is it still awesome?
i think it's the hat

la luna en calma,
susurra el río lento,
paz en la noche

hojas que caen,
una danza sin ruido,
el fin del verano

flor solitaria,
sobre piedra florece,
pura resistencia

morning sun breaks in,
light spills across the table,
cold coffee warms me

birds in the distance,
a melody without end,
sky hums with their joy

snow falls silently,
a blanket over the world,
all noise disappears

rain taps on the glass,
whispers of forgotten dreams,
night listens alone

barefoot on warm grass,
a childhood memory stirs,
laughter without age

same plot as before,
so why is it still awesome?
i think it's the hat

tea steam curls upward,
a tiny storm in my hands,
winter’s quiet joy
